cause.description:
Tigers are currently threatened by commercial poaching, loss of prey due to overhunting, and loss of habitat. A conciderable decline is associated with bones and other parts of tigers in traditional Chinese and Korean medicine. Tiger need to be protected and given a safe environment to live. For a video of these magnificent creatures copy the link below. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nj3NeI_oejA
1. Poaching of these gorgeous animals needs to stop NOW.
2. Awareness needs to be spread.
cause.mission: Gain awareness and to fund for the prevention of poaching and safe habitat.
cause.name: Tigers in Trouble
